about_the_game:
Cyber Assassin is a fast-paced arena shooter where you play as a robot annihilating everything in your path. Survive relentless waves of diverse enemies. After each wave, choose upgrades for your character to become even more effective at destroying enemy robots. Engage in intense combat, strategically enhance your abilities, and dominate the arena in Cyber Assassin!



Key Features:

  • Intense Arena Combat:

    Experience high-energy battles where quick reflexes and strategic thinking are key to surviving wave after wave of enemies.

  • Diverse Enemy Waves:

    Face a variety of foes, each with unique behaviors and attack patterns, keeping you on your toes and constantly adapting.

  • Upgrade System:

    After each wave, select from a range of upgrades to enhance your robot's abilities, tailoring your playstyle and increasing your chances of survival.

  • Dynamic Gameplay:

    Enjoy fast-paced, action-packed gameplay with ever-increasing challenges that push your skills to the limit.
detailed_description:
Feature List


About the Game



Cyber Assassin is a fast-paced arena shooter where you play as a robot annihilating everything in your path. Survive relentless waves of diverse enemies. After each wave, choose upgrades for your character to become even more effective at destroying enemy robots. Engage in intense combat, strategically enhance your abilities, and dominate the arena in Cyber Assassin!



Key Features:

  • Intense Arena Combat:

    Experience high-energy battles where quick reflexes and strategic thinking are key to surviving wave after wave of enemies.

  • Diverse Enemy Waves:

    Face a variety of foes, each with unique behaviors and attack patterns, keeping you on your toes and constantly adapting.

  • Upgrade System:

    After each wave, select from a range of upgrades to enhance your robot's abilities, tailoring your playstyle and increasing your chances of survival.

  • Dynamic Gameplay:

    Enjoy fast-paced, action-packed gameplay with ever-increasing challenges that push your skills to the limit.
name: Cyber Assasin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 315 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 315 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Cyber Assassin is a fast-paced arena shooter where you control a robot annihilating waves of enemies. Survive, upgrade your character after each wave, and become more powerful to dominate the arena!
